description.en-US: This talk introduces you to a workflow of tools to keep you productive and save your time

content.en-US:
- Gulp - streaming build system
- NPM - find, share, and reuse packages of code
- Sass support - CSS extension language
- Autoprefixer - parse CSS and add vendor prefixes to rules by Can I Use
- Source Maps - map a combined/minified file back to an unbuilt state
- Cross-device Synchronization
- Live Browser Reloading
- Built in HTTP Server ...


### Speaker

Dalibor Gogic is a Full-Stack Web Developer specializing in open web technologies and applications, Node.js, evented architectures, HTML5, design, and UX. Building innovative applications using cutting-edge technologies.

### Thursday, June 2nd 2016 at 7 PM

Vojvode Stepe 2, 22320 Indjija

description.en-US: This talk is about Analysis and Performance Optimization in Front-end workflow. Sequel of Automating Front-end Workflow talk.

content.en-US:
This talk is about Analysis and Performance Optimization in Front-end workflow. Sequel of Automating Front-end Workflow talk.

- Performance tools
- Analysis
- Concatenation and Minification
- Image compression
- HTTP v1.x Best practice ...

### Speaker

Dalibor Gogic is a Full-Stack Web Developer specializing in open web technologies and applications, Node.js, evented architectures, HTML5, design, and UX. Building innovative applications using cutting-edge technologies.

### Thursday, June 9th 2016 at 7 PM
